reviewText: Do not expect anything fancy with this video!  This is a video that will probably only be of interest to a student of ballet, a dance historian, or someone with a special interest in the Kirov.  We fit into that final category, as my daughter's main dance teacher has a solo on this video!  She currently teaches at Orlando Ballet, so any of you young dancers attending OBS for a summer intensive will likely have her for class.  She was and is amazing!
